title: Inspector Gadget. Travel trouble
brief_description: Inspector Gadget, Penny and Brain travel far and wide to fight the agents of MAD. Inspector Gadget takes risks as well as photgraphs on a trip to Africa. He also investigates a mountain top weather change in Tibet. Episode titles: Photo safari; Weather in Tibet
